roleset.name: cause to look like a criminal
roleset.note: INCRIMINATE-V NOTES: compare with other 'label' verbs. (from incriminate.01-v)

example.name: incriminate-v: no attribute
example.text: A federal judge ruled that Imelda Marcos wasn't brought to the U.S. against her will and that marital privileges, which protect spouses-1 from *trace*-1 incriminating each other, don't apply in her case.

example.name: incrimination-n
example.text: By testifying on another matter, a witness does not waive any privilege against self-incrimination for testimony that relates only to the witnessâ€™s character for truthfulness.
